rules_text:
[i]Lorecraft[/i] – You may cast Skullcap Arachnid as though its had flash if you control three or more enchantments.
Deathtouch, reach
flavor_text: [i]Unlike most of their kind on other planes, spiders on Azgol are completely blind. They build pits for their prey to fall into. Like other spiders, an easy meal for them is one that can't run away.[/i]
